string_unknown_explanation: There are connected controllers that could not be detected
These controllers will now be configured in a guided dialog
mapping_explanation: First the status of the actual action will be "Detect event"
Trigger an event on the controller that correspond to the action
After you triggered the event, release the event
The status of the action now changes to "Wait"
After the delay go on with the next action
no_mapping_database_found_a_new_one_will: No mapping database found. A new one will be created
trigger_the_event_then_release_it: Trigger the event then release it
